creator: ParagonsDAO
title: Paragons Pulse 12
content:encoded:
Through Paragons Pulse, we curate insights and intel from ParagonsDAO, the games/protocols we’re involved in, and beyond!

In this issue, read about:

  • 🌎🏟️ New partnerships
  • 🫂New contributors and councils
  • ⚡️Parallel early access, PRIME sinks, Echelon news
  • 🛡️ARBO staking airdrops
  • 👁️ The Watch
  • 💗 Our Project Pulse

And more!

ParagonsDAO updates

🌎🏟️Partnerships

We released a proposal to partner with @ThePriming. Learn more on our discussion forum…

ParagonsDAO on Twitter: "🌎⚡️The Priming. Ever heard of it?📄We've just released a proposal outlining potential partnership with @ThePriming - one of the most important community tools in the @ParallelTCG ecosystem with sights set beyond! 💬Community AMA coming soonhttps://t.co/2uKWkKCtSq / Twitter"

🌎⚡️The Priming. Ever heard of it?📄We've just released a proposal outlining potential partnership with @ThePriming - one of the most important community tools in the @ParallelTCG ecosystem with sights set beyond! 💬Community AMA coming soonhttps://t.co/2uKWkKCtSq

…and join our community AMA tomorrow in our Discord to discuss more and ask questions!

We formalized our partnership with @BLVKHVND & @ProjectStadium

ParagonsDAO on Twitter: "We're ecstatic for our future with @BLVKHVND/@ProjectStadium! The Paragons Council has voted in the next stage our long-term alignment through voting in PDIP 11.Read about it in this article, or continue in this thread for a short summary 👇🧵1/9https://t.co/mBgDsehLet￼ pic.twitter.com/qPIn90agSr / Twitter"

We're ecstatic for our future with @BLVKHVND/@ProjectStadium! The Paragons Council has voted in the next stage our long-term alignment through voting in PDIP 11.Read about it in this article, or continue in this thread for a short summary 👇🧵1/9https://t.co/mBgDsehLet￼ pic.twitter.com/qPIn90agSr

…and @BLVKHVND has proposed the next stage of their DAO evolution toward a truly decentralized esports org

BLVKHVND 🌜☠️🌛 on Twitter: "Today, we submitted a proposal to @nounsbuilder to evolve BLVKHVND into an esports org that can truly be owned by everyone. https://t.co/QjWIQgKOL3Here's why 🧵 / Twitter"

Today, we submitted a proposal to @nounsbuilder to evolve BLVKHVND into an esports org that can truly be owned by everyone. https://t.co/QjWIQgKOL3Here's why 🧵

🫂People

We launched elections for our Paragons Council and Treasury Council. The polls close today at 11:59 pm UTC so if you haven’t voted yet, do it now!

ParagonsDAO on Twitter: "🗳️ Voting for Epoch 3 Elections is now open$PDT holders and stakers can vote for our next Paragons and Treasury Councils by Dec 20 at 11:59 pm UTC🔍Review nominees, the process and next steps here https://t.co/1A1Tz1aZsF / Twitter"

🗳️ Voting for Epoch 3 Elections is now open$PDT holders and stakers can vote for our next Paragons and Treasury Councils by Dec 20 at 11:59 pm UTC🔍Review nominees, the process and next steps here https://t.co/1A1Tz1aZsF

We welcomed a new Lead Finance Contributor and Community Manager to our team

ParagonsDAO on Twitter: "We're pumped to welcome @0xMilamber and @Pricardodrak to our FT contributor team, starting today! Two amazing examples of how we're leveraging the talent, passion and momentum within our community as we prepare for a huge 2023👇🧵1/3 / Twitter"

We're pumped to welcome @0xMilamber and @Pricardodrak to our FT contributor team, starting today! Two amazing examples of how we're leveraging the talent, passion and momentum within our community as we prepare for a huge 2023👇🧵1/3

Other updates

🪙We published our Treasury Ethos outlining our responsible treasury strategy with a focus on building

ParagonsDAO on Twitter: "🪙Our treasury is resilient through rough market conditions. Why?⚖️Check out our Treasury Ethos-the guiding principles that help us responsibly manage our finances so we can focus on BUILDING!https://t.co/NKoczfDbrE / Twitter"

🪙Our treasury is resilient through rough market conditions. Why?⚖️Check out our Treasury Ethos-the guiding principles that help us responsibly manage our finances so we can focus on BUILDING!https://t.co/NKoczfDbrE

👕We had an awesome, fun chat with with @orphan_crypto and @heyhaigh, where we learned about @RAGS_Y3K and discussed all things Streetwear/Crypto/Tech/Insane Clown Posse 🔥💣. Check out the recording here.

Game updates

⚡️Parallel and Echelon

@ParallelTCG Pack Drop has been announced for January 14, 2023! This rounds out the Parallel Alpha collection in preparation for….

Parallel on Twitter: "𝗣𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝗗𝗿𝗼𝗽 𝟲January 14th, 2023 pic.twitter.com/P9eRiWvAHq / Twitter"

𝗣𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝗗𝗿𝗼𝗽 𝟲January 14th, 2023 pic.twitter.com/P9eRiWvAHq

…their closed Alpha release in February. Parallel announced the Early Access program, which sounds like it’ll be open to about 2k players. If you haven’t signed up, go for it! They want all types of players, so answer the survey honestly.

Parallel on Twitter: "𝗣𝗮𝗿𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗹'𝘀 𝗘𝗮𝗿𝗹𝘆 𝗔𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺𝗕𝗲𝗴𝗶𝗻𝘀 𝗙𝗲𝗯 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟯Registration for Parallel's Early Access Program is now open. Head to https://t.co/Zlb9x5DZAQ to sign up and get prepared for play testing // pic.twitter.com/xXWkegEwGv / Twitter"

𝗣𝗮𝗿𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗹'𝘀 𝗘𝗮𝗿𝗹𝘆 𝗔𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺𝗕𝗲𝗴𝗶𝗻𝘀 𝗙𝗲𝗯 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟯Registration for Parallel's Early Access Program is now open. Head to https://t.co/Zlb9x5DZAQ to sign up and get prepared for play testing // pic.twitter.com/xXWkegEwGv

Catch the recording of their Early Access Twitter Spaces here

They’ve also released the first two PRIME sinks 🚰 — both have shown incredible potential for PRIME velocity already!

//Kalos on Twitter: "𝗣𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝗖𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗱 𝗣𝗥𝗜𝗠𝗘 𝗦𝘂𝗻𝗸:𝟳.𝟮𝟲%Total PRIME Claimed:6,925,848.32Payload PRIME Sunk:213,045.00Artigraph PRIME Sunk:290,100.00Total PRIME Sunk:503,145.00 / Twitter"

𝗣𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝗖𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗱 𝗣𝗥𝗜𝗠𝗘 𝗦𝘂𝗻𝗸:𝟳.𝟮𝟲%Total PRIME Claimed:6,925,848.32Payload PRIME Sunk:213,045.00Artigraph PRIME Sunk:290,100.00Total PRIME Sunk:503,145.00

🚰 1 — Artigraphs allow holders to exchange PRIME for a limited edition card signed by the artist.

Parallel on Twitter: "𝗔𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗵Available as an exclusive and limited upgrade, you may now have your favorite Parallel card digitally signed by the artist that designed it. Submit PRIME tokens + your card to receive an Artigraph of that card.https://t.co/hLwpAlYaJn pic.twitter.com/Xs9rglpPM8 / Twitter"

𝗔𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗵Available as an exclusive and limited upgrade, you may now have your favorite Parallel card digitally signed by the artist that designed it. Submit PRIME tokens + your card to receive an Artigraph of that card.https://t.co/hLwpAlYaJn pic.twitter.com/Xs9rglpPM8

🚰 2 — Payload allows players to collect cards to round out their decks for 1 PRIME each, with a focus on common/uncommons.

Parallel on Twitter: "𝗣𝗮𝘆𝗹𝗼𝗮𝗱Swap 1 Prime for 1 card. What you get is random and can be anything from a First Edition Common to a Prime rarity Asset. This gives players a chance to fill out their decks with NFTs for a low Prime cost, or possibly pull something more.https://t.co/u5ZxjEAhQZ pic.twitter.com/nhI700Dpmf / Twitter"

𝗣𝗮𝘆𝗹𝗼𝗮𝗱Swap 1 Prime for 1 card. What you get is random and can be anything from a First Edition Common to a Prime rarity Asset. This gives players a chance to fill out their decks with NFTs for a low Prime cost, or possibly pull something more.https://t.co/u5ZxjEAhQZ pic.twitter.com/nhI700Dpmf

And judging by this graph, you’re going to have FOMO if you’re not playing with a full deck of NFT cards.

If you don’t have a full deck, or want to borrow better cards…just borrow from us, for free

How we’ll share our Web3 game assets using Reputation as Credit

Echelon has been tirelessly engaging the community for feedback on several topics, including Emissary Prime elections, the Ardent Prime program, and timeline for the unlock of the PRIME token.

Their latest bulletin:

Echelon on Twitter: "Bulletin 22.02 V2 - revised to account for community feedback.https://t.co/fSHgt6PZgfJoin us Thursday, December 22 at 1pm EST for a community call to discuss. Click '1 Event' at the top of the sidebar on Discord and hit 'Interested' for a notification when we go live. / Twitter"

Bulletin 22.02 V2 - revised to account for community feedback.https://t.co/fSHgt6PZgfJoin us Thursday, December 22 at 1pm EST for a community call to discuss. Click '1 Event' at the top of the sidebar on Discord and hit 'Interested' for a notification when we go live.

The unlock of PRIME has a significant impact on us and our community.

Our councils are evaluating the options they’ve laid out in the linked forum post. Our official vote may be influenced by how liquidity will be managed, and the role we can play.

PRIME Unlock Options

🛡️ARBO

️@meetARBO’s Basic Combat Training opened earlier this month — a unique way that you can help co-create and test the game’s mechanics while competing for prizes in a $100k prize pool!

ARBO on Twitter: "Basic Combat Training is live! https://t.co/SAAIO8KfJhContribute to game balancing and testing to win from our massive prize pool! Details in our Discord: https://t.co/igbMNOKgN5#Play2Earn #Web3 #NFTs #gaming / Twitter"

Basic Combat Training is live! https://t.co/SAAIO8KfJhContribute to game balancing and testing to win from our massive prize pool! Details in our Discord: https://t.co/igbMNOKgN5#Play2Earn #Web3 #NFTs #gaming

️There are already over 60 strategies posted — that’s over 180 heroes and 900 protocols. We’ve submitted 3 so far!

A snapshot will be taken of all posted Strategies today at 12pm EST — the team will airdrop a free protocol to all stakers.

ARBO on Twitter: "900 @meetARBO Protocol cards (#SFT) and 180 Heroes (#NFT) have been staked for Basic Combat Training to date.Players mine prizes by being drawn into & winning internal test games played by devs. Snapshot of all staked Strategies for a free unreleased Protocol to be announced. pic.twitter.com/QV0TsvAYaU / Twitter"

900 @meetARBO Protocol cards (#SFT) and 180 Heroes (#NFT) have been staked for Basic Combat Training to date.Players mine prizes by being drawn into & winning internal test games played by devs. Snapshot of all staked Strategies for a free unreleased Protocol to be announced. pic.twitter.com/QV0TsvAYaU

ARBO also releasing a free NFT mint tomorrow, December 21, for previously unreleased protocols you can use to build out your strategies.

ARBO on Twitter: "👁️ Bootcamp FanFaucet will go live December 21st. Claim one free Protocol wallet/account. pic.twitter.com/cQKDMQirZ4 / Twitter"

👁️ Bootcamp FanFaucet will go live December 21st. Claim one free Protocol wallet/account. pic.twitter.com/cQKDMQirZ4

👁️The Watch

The game once known as “Frontier” is now “The Watch” following a rebranding.

Check out their latest Sprint Sync, where they outline their progress towards their MVP (pre-Alpha release), for select collectors…they’re getting close!

THE WATCH on Twitter: "𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗦𝗽𝗿𝗶𝗻𝘁 𝗦𝘆𝗻𝗰We are now getting close to Pre-Alpha for a selection of Stellar Members. ✚ Read now at https://t.co/f4cKb6ovKa pic.twitter.com/MQgVFDWPcW / Twitter"

𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗦𝗽𝗿𝗶𝗻𝘁 𝗦𝘆𝗻𝗰We are now getting close to Pre-Alpha for a selection of Stellar Members. ✚ Read now at https://t.co/f4cKb6ovKa pic.twitter.com/MQgVFDWPcW

💗Our Project Pulse

In the past few weeks we’ve had new partnerships. New hires. An election. A treasury philosophy. And big news in the games we’re involved in — all while we continue to build. Much more to come in 2023!

Happy Holidays all and thanks for reading! If you enjoyed this update, make sure to subscribe to our Medium to get notified when the next edition comes out (and give it a clap or two while you’re at it)!

Follow us on Twitter and join our Discord.

Trade PDT, ParagonsDAO’s token, through Uniswap (or use Cowswap to prevent frontrunning). PDT’s contract address is 0x375abb85c329753b1ba849a601438ae77eec9893.

Check out PDT on CoinGecko.

Paragons Pulse 12 was originally published in ParagonsDAO on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

ARBO also releasing a free NFT mint tomorrow, December 21, for previously unreleased protocols you can use to build out your strategies.
ARBO on Twitter: "👁️ Bootcamp FanFaucet will go live December 21st. Claim one free Protocol wallet/account. pic.twitter.com/cQKDMQirZ4 / Twitter"
👁️ Bootcamp FanFaucet will go live December 21st. Claim one free Protocol wallet/account. pic.twitter.com/cQKDMQirZ4
👁️The Watch
The game once known as “Frontier” is now “The Watch” following a rebranding.
Check out their latest Sprint Sync, where they outline their progress towards their MVP (pre-Alpha release), for select collectors…they’re getting close!
THE WATCH on Twitter: "𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗦𝗽𝗿𝗶𝗻𝘁 𝗦𝘆𝗻𝗰We are now getting close to Pre-Alpha for a selection of Stellar Members. ✚ Read now at https://t.co/f4cKb6ovKa pic.twitter.com/MQgVFDWPcW / Twitter"

💗Our Project Pulse
In the past few weeks we’ve had new partnerships. New hires. An election. A treasury philosophy. And big news in the games we’re involved in — all while we continue to build. Much more to come in 2023!

Happy Holidays all and thanks for reading! If you enjoyed this update, make sure to subscribe to our Medium to get notified when the next edition comes out (and give it a clap or two while you’re at it)!
